services.title: node101
services.description: We provide multiple infrastructure support and Event hostsing in Turkey for Cosmos Based project Here are some of our services and events: state-sync, seed, peers, IBC relaying, PRC, API, GRPC, JSON RPC etc. Also these are our events we have hosted; https://www.cryptist.org/ , https://istanbulblockchainsummit.org/ , https://events.node101.io/
